text: Amara to amadera rasulaganake pathiye diyechilama suspasta pramanadi diye, ara tamdera sange amara abatarana karechilama dharmagrantha o manadanda yate lokera n'yayabicara pratistha karate pare, ara amara loha pathiyechi yate rayeche birata saktimatta o manusera jan'ya upakarita, ara yena allah janate parena ke tamke o tamra rasulaganake agocare'o sahayya kare. Nihsandeha allah mahabaliyana, mahasaktisali.
